subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mark Gottfried, in his second season as the men’s basketball coach at North Carolina State, plans to take the Wolfpack back to the elite in the A.C.C. and nationally.
snippet: Mark Gottfried, in his second season as the men’s basketball coach at North Carolina State, plans to take the Wolfpack back to the elite in the A.C.C. and nationally.
